column1: OtherSpeak : You have to help me, please!

column2: OtherSpeak : They took him and they went that way.

column1: Narrator : A group of bandits is resting in the shade of a tree. They don't seem to have noticed CAPITAINE yet.
column5: Narrator : A group of bandits is dangerously getting closer to CAPITAINE.

column1: Narrator : Someone tied up is calling for help from behind them.
column5: Narrator : Someone tied up is calling for help from behind them.

column2: Choice : Hey! Let the kid go! (attack)

column7: OtherSpeak : And where do you think you’re going?
column8: PlayerSpeak : Imperials are on the way, you have ten seconds to leave.
column9: OtherSpeak : Oh you mean the ones we killed already?

column8: OtherSpeak : Let’s go, I don’t want to a stinky jail cell again!

column1: Choice : Forget your parents, kid! We could use someone like you! (member)
column2: Choice : We’re taking you back to your parents! (quest)
OtherSpeak : Thank you so much for saving me!

column1: OtherSpeak : Anything to avoid the wrath of my parents!
OtherSpeak : They'd flog me big time for running away and getting myself in trouble!
OtherSpeak : Where is my child! Is everything ok?
Choice : Yes ! I brought him back !

column3: OtherSpeak : Hurry up ! I’m so worried

column2: OtherSpeak : That’s terrible, why would you lie about such horrible things…
